citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1100 on
12/16/2015. Inspector knocked at the house and tried the phone numbers listed for the facility leaving a message at
two of the numbers. No response was obtained to any of the above, The inspector waited 30 minutes at the facility.

narrative:

ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
